Articles.Content:
Hello guys!

I just bought the game, and i found some problems. I use Ubuntu 14.04 LTS, i bought the game via Steam.

When i started the very first Tutorial, the construction one, the whole background is black. Its kinda annoying, and also at the second Tutorial, my M [Map] modi looks really weird. 

Is this a known issue? Any workaround?

I am using a laptop, an HP Probook 430, this should be able to run the game without problems.

Intel? AMD?

There can be issues  with these cards, they don't like it when KSP's built-in antialiasing is on and can cause the black background you describe, so can PPFX edge highlighting, so try turning those off.

You can force antialiasing via AMD graphics card drivers, not sure about Intel.

It has Built-In Intel stuff. 

Your solution worked. Thanks a lot! I am really glad it had nothing to do with the fact that i use Linux.

Thanks again!
